name: Back Seat Driver
description:
Made for the Game Makers Tool Kit Game Jam 2018

Theme:  [Genre] but you can't [Mechanic]
Our take: A Racing game but you're not the driver.

Goal: You've gotta catch your rocket or you'll be stuck on this planet for another 400 years! Tell your driver how to get there, but don't be too pushy or he won't listen! Avoid the red roads as they'll slow you down! Use the green roads to travel faster!

Controls:
Type "left" or"right" and hit Enter
Esc: Quit to Main menu

Credits:
Music and Sounds from freesound.org
Made by Jayne Gale & Sean Michael
